articles.title: 'Please desist for your safety': NYP student does Helikopter spin on escalator for TikTok - AsiaOne
articles.description: A video of a Nanyang Polytechnic (NYP) student having a bit of fun on top of a moving escalator has gone viral on TikTok — to the point that his institution has noticed this six-second clip. NYP wasn't pleased with what they saw and left a few firm replies in…
